qas.question: What type of Buddhists believe that personal effort is required to realize rebirth?
Laypersons can perform good actions, producing what?

context: <a0_0>Theravadin<a0_0/> Buddhists believe that personal effort is required to realize rebirth. Monks follow the vinaya: meditating, teaching and serving their lay communities. Laypersons can perform good actions, producing <a1_0>merit<a1_0/>.
